text: Adriana Lima (born June 12, 1981) is a Brazilian supermodel. She is well known for her work with underwear company Victoria's Secret. == Early life and family == Adriana Lima was born in Salvador, Bahia, Brazil on June 12, 1981Adriana Lima profile at Celebrina.com Retrieved on 2007-07-15. and is an only child to her parents Nelson Torres and Maria da Graça Lima, a social worker. When she was 6 months old, her father left her and her mother.IMDB bio accessed 2007-06-23. She has not talked to him since then. Since 2007 she has been trying to meet with him again.Lima tries to reconcile with her father accessed 2007-06-23. She is married to Serbian basketball player Marko Jarić, and they have two daughters. In early 2014, the couple announced that they have separated. == References == == Other websites == * * DNA models * Adrianazone.com Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian models Category:People from Salvador, Bahia
title: Adriana Lima
